channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Graffiti, 15th June
item.description:
Either these bus stops are being targeted or the graffiti isn't getting cleaned when reported.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): South Eden Park Road, Eden Park, London

item.category: Graffiti / Flyposting on stop or shelter (non-offensive)

item.title: Light in Alleyway not working, 15th June
item.description:
The light in the alleyway between 43 & 39 Setchell Way SE1 has been out for some time. At night the alleyway is attracting antisocial behaviour alcohol and drug abuse, being used as a toilet, defecating, swearing and aggressive when challenged. Please can this repair be treated as urgent to prevent a continuation of the anti-social behaviour. Thanks

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Curtis Street, Old Kent Road, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dead fox cub on grass verge outside 19 Little Birches, 15th June
item.description:
Fox cub killed by car. Hit by car. Being attacked by birds. Is on walking route to local parks / likely to distress small children. Now laid on grass verge.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 37, Little Birches, Longlands, Sidcup, London

item.title: Large heavy goods vehicle, 15th June
item.description:
Large Lorry continuously parked in location, out of business hours, overnight. Leaving very narrow passing and also blocks the view of the turn into and out of Midhurst Hill which is already overcrowded with many parked cars.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Rochester Drive, Bexley, London
Report on FixMyStreet
